Description.Text: Location The hotel has an excellent location in front of one of the most beautiful postcard settings in Salvador and near to the historical district of Salvador. Pelourinho and the popular Farol da Barra beach are 10 km from the hotel. The Aero Club Plaza show and convention centre and many restaurants and bars with live music are just 5 minutes away by car. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 49 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. A lift provides easy access to the upper floors. Services such as a cloakroom and a safe make for a comfortable stay. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a dining area, a breakfast room and a bar. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. A garage can be used for parking. Additional services include room service and a laundry. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, a kitchen and a bathroom. The accommodation units each feature a double bed. A safe and a minibar also feature. A mini-fridge is included as standard. A washing machine is also available to guests. Convenient features include internet access, a telephone, a TV and wireless internet access. Each of the bathrooms features a shower and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers a selection of sport and leisure opportunities. Leisure options available to guests include a gym. Meals Various meals and board options are bookable. Guests can choose from breakfast, lunch, dinner and B & B. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the establishment: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.

The hotel has an excellent location in front of one of the most beautiful postcard settings in Salvador and near to the historical district of Salvador. Pelourinho and the popular Farol da Barra beach are 10 km from the hotel. The Aero Club Plaza show and convention centre and many restaurants and bars with live music are just 5 minutes away by car.

All accommodation units feature air conditioning, a kitchen and a bathroom. The accommodation units each feature a double bed. A safe and a minibar also feature. A mini-fridge is included as standard. A washing machine is also available to guests. Convenient features include internet access, a telephone, a TV and wireless internet access. Each of the bathrooms features a shower and a hairdryer.

The establishment comprises a total of 49 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. A lift provides easy access to the upper floors. Services such as a cloakroom and a safe make for a comfortable stay. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a dining area, a breakfast room and a bar. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. A garage can be used for parking. Additional services include room service and a laundry.
The establishment offers a selection of sport and leisure opportunities. Leisure options available to guests include a gym.
Various meals and board options are bookable. Guests can choose from breakfast, lunch, dinner and B & B.
The following credit cards are accepted at the establishment: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.
